channel.title: All demo project remixes?
channel.description: I was just wondering if I could make an album of all the sound pack demos remixed by me? Since there was no demo for boom bass (that will be hard!) or destiny, I will make these ones up. But am I allowed to make remixes of Grand Pianos, 7 Skies Selection, Sound of Vivrant, RAC Essentials, Vintage Keys, The Future, Melodic Percussion and Acoustic Guitars? In the album description and the track descriptions I will acknowledge @Auxy (or if you didn’t make all of them then the people who did make them). Also, I know many people have been asking about these but those were individual, this is for all of them. Thanks, Mr Mooo

item.title: All demo project remixes?
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Yeah go for it! None of them are done by me though.

Read full topic

item.title: All demo project remixes?
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
I was just wondering if I could make an album of all the sound pack demos remixed by me? Since there was no demo for boom bass (that will be hard!) or destiny, I will make these ones up. But am I allowed to make remixes of Grand Pianos, 7 Skies Selection, Sound of Vivrant, RAC Essentials, Vintage Keys, The Future, Melodic Percussion and Acoustic Guitars? In the album description and the track descriptions I will acknowledge @Auxy (or if you didn’t make all of them then the people who did make them).
Also, I know many people have been asking about these but those were individual, this is for all of them.
Thanks,
Mr Mooo
